segments.text: From my view, the kitchen looks bright and homey.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight pours through the divided window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries a plate, her expression calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet pouring water endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, water sheeting down to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle but doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the boy's climbing for cookies on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is precarious, one wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists, hand outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret cookie heist is clever, I admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks—the wet floor, the tipping stool—worry me deeply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is idyllic, unaware of the turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would notice and fix this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see potential harm ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the innocence of the kids softens it a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
